bet.no-bets-placed: No trades placed for this round.

notifications.already-have-position: You can only open 1 trade per round.
notifications.unknown-error: Could not connect to the operator

howto.title: How It Works?
howto.d1: Select the direction (Buy, Sell), the [Multiplier] rate, and the [Margin] amount you want to commit.
howto.d2: Click Open Trade to follow your position in the open trades menu; if it becomes profitable, click [Close] to secure your profit.
howto.d3: After selecting the product, set the amount you want to invest.
howto.d4: Enter the multiplier rate you want to use.
howto.d5: Execute the trade to increase your profit.
